4531.verse: ۞ وَٱذْكُرْ|And mention|125|143|2841$أَخَا|(the) brother|107|144|15709$عَادٍ|(of) Aad,|80|117|1497$إِذْ|when|55|92|1198$أَنذَرَ|he warned|89|126|15710$قَوْمَهُۥ|his people|86|104|6886$بِٱلْأَحْقَافِ|in the Al-Ahqaf -|132|153|15711$وَقَدْ خَلَتِ|and had already passed away|217|259|15696$ٱلنُّذُرُ|[the] warners|111|153|15712$مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ|before him|140|161|9364$وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦٓ|and after him,|129|140|9365$أَلَّا|`That not|86|108|2011$تَعْبُدُوٓاْ|you worship|99|121|8359$إِلَّا|except|65|87|86$ٱللَّهَ|Allah.|56|78|184$إِنِّىٓ|Indeed, I|80|102|312$أَخَافُ|[I] fear|76|87|4898$عَلَيْكُمْ|for you|76|131|416$عَذَابَ|a punishment|108|217|1786$يَوْمٍ|(of) a Day|88|197|2331$عَظِيمٍ|Great.`|75|130|3522$

4532.verse: قَالُوٓاْ|They said,|89|98|101$أَجِئْتَنَا|`Have you come to us|169|188|6516$لِتَأْفِكَنَا|to turn us away|126|145|15713$عَنْ|from|54|73|1105$ءَالِهَتِنَا|our gods?|84|103|8546$فَأْتِنَا|Then bring us|110|119|6521$بِمَا|what|53|74|43$تَعِدُنَآ|you threaten us,|131|174|6522$إِن|if|44|87|225$كُنتَ|you are|70|113|1281$مِنَ|of|50|93|156$ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ|the truthful.`|113|134|5400$

4534.verse: فَلَمَّا|Then when|93|100|141$رَأَوْهُ|they saw it|95|110|15715$عَارِضًا|(as) a cloud|100|114|15716$مُّسْتَقْبِلَ|approaching|100|114|15717$أَوْدِيَتِهِمْ|their valleys,|105|120|15718$قَالُواْ|they said,|86|100|101$هَـٰذَا|`This|59|66|248$عَارِضٌ|(is) a cloud|95|102|15719$مُّمْطِرُنَا‌ۚ|bringing us rain.`|133|146|15720$بَلْ|Nay,|50|63|848$هُوَ|it|48|61|298$مَا|(is) what|80|93|262$ٱسْتَعْجَلْتُم بِهِۦ‌ۖ|you were asking it to be hastened,|252|259|15721$رِيحٌ|a wind|63|122|8079$فِيهَا|in it|54|172|253$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|253|72$أَلِيمٌ|painful,|68|127|93$

4535.verse: تُدَمِّرُ|Destroying|90|97|15722$كُلَّ|every|57|70|2487$شَىْءِۭ|thing|69|82|186$بِأَمْرِ|by (the) command|142|155|11252$رَبِّهَا|(of) its Lord.|104|117|9603$فَأَصْبَحُواْ|Then they became (such),|197|204|5056$لَا|not|42|54|30$يُرَىٰٓ|is seen|66|90|15723$إِلَّا|except|65|88|86$مَسَـٰكِنُهُمْ‌ۚ|their dwellings.|119|142|13491$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|100|702$نَجْزِى|We recompense|125|148|5793$ٱلْقَوْمَ|the people|90|102|2316$ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ|[the] criminals.|120|120|5641$

4536.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|120|640$مَكَّنَّـٰهُمْ|We had established them|187|202|5424$فِيمَآ|in what|69|84|1058$إِن|not|44|59|225$مَّكَّنَّـٰكُمْ|We have established you|186|201|6261$فِيهِ|in it,|50|58|32$وَجَعَلْنَا|and We made|110|121|4805$لَهُمْ|for them|76|97|98$سَمْعًا|hearing|70|91|11040$وَأَبْصَـٰرًا|and vision|106|127|15724$وَأَفْــِٔدَةً|and hearts.|96|117|15725$فَمَآ|But not|69|90|132$أَغْنَىٰ|availed|71|82|6428$عَنْهُمْ|them|66|72|2643$سَمْعُهُمْ|their hearing|103|116|15258$وَلَآ|and not|71|84|25$أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ|their vision|110|123|6424$وَلَآ|and not|71|84|25$أَفْــِٔدَتُهُم|their hearts|97|110|15726$مِّن|any|50|63|53$شَىْءٍ|thing,|69|75|186$إِذْ|when|55|61|1198$كَانُواْ|they were|87|99|94$يَجْحَدُونَ|rejecting|104|116|5538$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِ|(the) Signs|94|106|609$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|93|2$وَحَاقَ|and enveloped|116|128|8381$بِهِم|them|53|65|125$مَّا|what|53|59|262$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|211|94$بِهِۦ|[at it]|60|248|204$يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ|ridicule.|123|217|5420$

4537.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|127|640$أَهْلَكْنَا|We destroyed|112|152|5422$مَا|what|53|93|262$حَوْلَكُم|surrounds you|113|153|7863$مِّنَ|of|50|90|156$ٱلْقُرَىٰ|the towns,|92|112|5829$وَصَرَّفْنَا|and We have diversified|178|210|11647$ٱلْأَيَـٰتِ|the Signs,|87|150|1099$لَعَلَّهُمْ|that they may|115|178|1621$يَرْجِعُونَ|return.|105|137|3002$

4538.verse: فَلَوْلَا|Then why (did) not|148|159|635$نَصَرَهُمُ|help them|96|117|15727$ٱلَّذِينَ|those whom|100|121|20$ٱتَّخَذُواْ|they had taken|121|142|4600$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|122|224$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|64|2$قُرْبَانًا ءَالِهَةَۢ‌ۖ|gods as a way of approach?|207|230|15728$بَلْ|Nay,|50|96|848$ضَلُّواْ|they were lost|116|162|4661$عَنْهُمْ‌ۚ|from them.|92|138|2643$وَذَٲلِكَ|And that|78|101|3792$إِفْكُهُمْ|(was) their falsehood|161|203|15729$وَمَا|and what|82|167|46$كَانُواْ|they were|87|172|94$يَفْتَرُونَ|inventing.|91|133|2726$

4531.verse: And mention, [O Muhammad], the brother of 'Aad, when he warned his people in the [region of] al-Ahqaf - and warners had already passed on before him and after him - [saying], "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."

4532.verse: They said, "Have you come to delude us away from our gods? Then bring us what you promise us, if you should be of the truthful."

4533.verse: He said, "Knowledge [of its time] is only with Allah, and I convey to you that with which I was sent; but I see you [to be] a people behaving ignorantly."

4534.verse: And when they saw it as a cloud approaching their valleys, they said, "This is a cloud bringing us rain!" Rather, it is that for which you were impatient: a wind, within it a painful punishment,

4535.verse: Destroying everything by command of its Lord. And they became so that nothing was seen [of them] except their dwellings. Thus do We recompense the criminal people.

4536.verse: And We had certainly established them in such as We have not established you, and We made for them hearing and vision and hearts. But their hearing and vision and hearts availed them not from anything [of the punishment] when they were [continually] rejecting the signs of Allah; and they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

4537.verse: And We have already destroyed what surrounds you of [those] cities, and We have diversified the signs [or verses] that perhaps they might return [from disbelief].

4538.verse: Then why did those they took besides Allah as deities by which to approach [Him] not aid them? But they had strayed from them. And that was their falsehood and what they were inventing.
